inna rabbaka huwa aʿlamu biman ḍalla ʿan sabīlihi wahuwa aʿlamu bil-muh'tadīna
idhā tut'lā ʿalayhi āyātunā qāla asāṭīru al-awalīna
innā balawnāhum kamā balawnā aṣḥāba al-janati idh aqsamū layaṣrimunnahā muṣ'biḥīna
faṭāfa ʿalayhā ṭāifun min rabbika wahum nāimūna
ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
an lā yadkhulannahā al-yawma ʿalaykum mis'kīnun
qāla awsaṭuhum alam aqul lakum lawlā tusabbiḥūna
qālū sub'ḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
ʿasā rabbunā an yub'dilanā khayran min'hā innā ilā rabbinā rāghibūna
kadhālika al-ʿadhābu walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati akbaru law kānū yaʿlamūna
inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
am lakum aymānun ʿalaynā bālighatun ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati inna lakum lamā taḥkumūna
am lahum shurakāu falyatū bishurakāihim in kānū ṣādiqīna
yawma yuk'shafu ʿan sāqin wayud'ʿawna ilā al-sujūdi falā yastaṭīʿūna
khāshiʿatan abṣāruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun waqad kānū yud'ʿawna ilā al-sujūdi wahum sālimūna
fadharnī waman yukadhibu bihādhā al-ḥadīthi sanastadrijuhum min ḥaythu lā yaʿlamūna
am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qalūna
fa-iṣ'bir liḥuk'mi rabbika walā takun kaṣāḥibi al-ḥūti idh nādā wahuwa makẓūmun
lawlā an tadārakahu niʿ'matun min rabbihi lanubidha bil-ʿarāi wahuwa madhmūmun
wa-in yakādu alladhīna kafarū layuz'liqūnaka bi-abṣārihim lammā samiʿū al-dhik'ra wayaqūlūna innahu lamajnūnun
